name: La Salamanca
storyline:
SYNOPSIS:
In La Salamanca, you put yourself in the shoes of a young man from Argentina, who after the mysterious disappearance of all his friends during a trip to Santiago del Estero, will have to look for them in their supposed meeting place: An old and dark apartment complex called "El Portal", a "cozy" place, which is not really what it seems...

Inspired by a local urban legend from Argentina[/b], you will have to go deeper and deeper into this hell of a place, to finally reveal the truth of what happened with your colleagues, and what this site is truly hiding.
summary: "La Salamanca" is an inmersive first-person psychological horror experience, a story-driven game where you traverse different sections, solve puzzles, and survive the horrors lurking in the shadows of a twisted apartment complex. Inspired by an Argentine local urban legend.
